entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 12 January 2023
